column5: I hear from the NORTH there was little snow and very little rain so far this spring so it could mean water level in rivers and lakes be below normal
here is a good place to get an idea of water levels compared to the averageshttp://www.lwcb.ca/waterflowdata.html
Most places the participation has been pretty normal. Maybe not the past couple weeks, but water levels should be normal.
We've had our fair share of rain this spring (Port Clinton, OH).....snow and rain mix tonight...3-4 inches of snow by tomorrow forecasted here....ugh.
